title: OIST Graduation Ball 2026
text:
â„¹ï¸ FAQs
Where exactly is the event?
Different locations within the OIST Center Building. The main event will be held in Caesarâ€™s Kitchen.
I am graduating. Do I need to get a ticket?
No, graduates get free entry. Please register at Cafe Tancha during ticket sales or fill in the reservation form to help us with the headcount.
How will you know who paid for a ticket?
We will have a list of ticket holders at the entrance and give you a wristband when you enter.
Guest parking?
OISTâ€™s main parking building is available for use.
Can I bring a guest?
Yes, but they will need to purchase a ticket for them.
